articles.content: London: Scientists have developed an innovative technology that can halve the time taken to detect patients with heart failure, and may be useful for improving diagnosis and delivering more effective… [+2269 chars]

articles.author: Kirti Pandey
articles.title: 7 foods to boost your brain power and health: Listen to Harvard-trained psychiatrist and nutrition expert on F - Times Now
articles.description: The intestines are called the second brain. A growing body of research shows that what we eat and how the gut microbiota reacts to our food can determine our mental well-being. Nutritional Psychiatrists Dr Drew Ramsey and Dr Uma Naidu (Harvard) share advice o…
